content:
A new stream for notes about today's Connectathon...
Confluence track page: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/CMS2021-07+ONC+FAST+Exchange

Hi Frank - perhaps we can add a note that if anyone wants to test AppPath routing - they need to coordinate with Mike McCune or myself - because by default that is disabled due to the fact that it conflicts with other routing options. Not a big deal - but important if anyone wants to test that routing option outside of the connectathon.
